events.message: I ordered a pair of shoes last week but they don’t fit at all. I want to return them and get a refund as soon as possible.
The case was identified as a refund request due to customer wanting to return an ill-fitting product.
The support case has been assigned to agent Sarah to assist with the refund process.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you’d like to return your shoes and receive a refund. I’m here to help!
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the shoes are unworn and in the original packaging?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The shoes are still in the box, unworn, and with all tags attached.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated the refund process. Please ship the shoes back using the prepaid return label I will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and help! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the shoes back today.
We have received your returned shoes and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported, this case is now closed.
